title: RVCA
content:
Anybody know the typeface used for the RVCA logo???

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140930082537im_/http:/typophile.com/files/rvca-logo_5201.gif)
author: Renasci

comments.content: This is likely custom, but you can get close by modifying [FF QType](http://web.archive.org/web/20140930082537/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_qtype_semi_extended_medium/?sample_text=RVCA&sample_size=48) or [FF Cube](http://web.archive.org/web/20140930082537/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_cube_ot_expanded_bold/?sample_text=RVCA&sample_size=48).
